resources.string: Ski Boots - How to put them on
Ski Boots can be challenge to put on for a beginner.Don\'t worry! Follow this guide to putting on ski boots and ski in comfort
How to Carry Skins - Beginner Ski Lesson
Carrying skis is tricky unless someone tells you how to do it properly.Ski instructor and presenter of the Ski School Series of Apps explains a couple of ways of carrying skis and things to watch out
With a strong snow plough turn and commitment you can now start to learn how yo ski parralel.Ski instructor helps you to get the uphill ski to drift in parallel at the end of the turn.
